title: DevOps & Cloud Tech Lead - Capgemini
description: As DevOps & Cloud leader of 5GOPEN ROAD project, I contribute to implementing innovative and eco-friendly mobility solutions based on 5G technology.

tasks.description: Definition and implementation of best DevOps practices within teams
Development and maintenance of pipelines (CI/CD) with Azure DevOps, ArgoCD and Ansible.
Development and maintenance of infra as code
Deployment of development and testing environments in the cloud
Constant support during deployment on edge servers with partners

title: Technical Lead - Capgemini
description: As Lead Tech of 5G Lab project, a project that aims to create innovative solutions based on 5G and related technologies for industries and smart cities. My key contributions are:

tasks.description: Supporting development teams in Devops best practices and technical problem solving
Setting up Cloud-Native microservice architecture for 5G use case demos, such as augmented reality, telemedicine, traffic management and public safety
Creating CI/CD pipelines for quality, security and performance of applications deployed on the cloud & edge servers
Automating and optimizing deployment, monitoring and incident resolution processes

title: Technical Lead - Capgemini
description: As lead tech of WebAgent project for Securitas World leader in private security. My key contributions are :

tasks.description: Design, development and deployment of web app
Coordination and training of development teams
Direct contact with client to collect needs, feedback and validations

title: Full-stack Developer - Capgemini
description: Full stack developer of E-Monthly project for Safran Aircraft Engine World leader in aeronautical propulsion and engine industrialization for civil and military aircraft. I am responsible for:

tasks.description: Writing functional specifications
Developing front-end and back-end features, complying with security and performance standards
Participating in continuous integration and code review

title: Full-stack Developer - Capgemini
description: As full stack developer within Workflow project of CEA major research actor in four domains: low-carbon energies, digital, medicine of the future, defense and security. I am responsible for:

tasks.description: Design of different screens of portal
Creation and design of database and stored procedures.
Development of front-end and back-end features.

title: Ruby on Rails Developer - 1Year1Book
description: Ruby on Rails developer at 1Year1Book, innovative startup for creating personalized online memory books. I am responsible for:

tasks.description: Development of new features for the platform
Bug fixing and performance optimization
Automation of internal tools: archiving of Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator files, importing and migrating users (Shell/Bash scripts, AWS functions)

title: Dotnet Developer - Groupe Randstad France
description: Dotnet developer at Randstad World leader in human resources consulting, offering solutions tailored to businesses and candidates. I am responsible for:

tasks.description: Participating in development of Osmos tool, an internal software package to manage company activities
Developing new features in .Net / C# / Windows
Optimizing some processes using Oracle SQL to query and manipulate data
Writing functional specifications to document changes of tool, following company standards and methods
